eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.calc

Class ExperienceCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.calc.ExperienceCalculator

  • public class ExperienceCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to calculate the experience gains of players. Also handles level ups.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

      • updateExperienceBar

        public static void updateExperienceBar(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Updates the experience bar of a player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to update the bar.

      • grantExperience

        public static int grantExperience(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                  int tier,
                                  double earnedxp)
        Gives experience points to the player and levels them up, if 100% is reached. Adds bonuses, based on level and passive stats.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to receive the exp.
        tier - The tier (max player level) for the exp reward.
        earnedxp - The earned exp without modifiers.
        Returns:
        The exp amount to display.
        See Also:
        grantExperience(Player, int, double, Location, boolean)

      • grantExperience

        public static int grantExperience(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                  int tier,
                                  double earnedxp,
                                  org.bukkit.Location location)
        Gives experience points to the player and levels them up, if 100% is reached. Adds bonuses, based on level and passive stats.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to receive the exp.
        tier - The tier (max player level) for the exp reward.
        earnedxp - The earned exp without modifiers.
        location - The location for an exp indicator or null for none.
        Returns:
        The exp amount to display.
        See Also:
        grantExperience(Player, int, double, Location, boolean)

      • grantExperience

        public static int grantExperience(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                  int tier,
                                  double earnedxp,
                                  org.bukkit.Location location,
                                  boolean shared)
        Gives experience points to the player and levels them up, if 100% is reached. Adds bonuses, based on level and passive stats.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to receive the exp.
        tier - The tier (max player level) for the exp reward.
        earnedxp - The earned exp without modifiers.
        location - The location for an exp indicator or null for none.
        shared - If the exp was already shared (25%) with group members.
        Returns:
        The exp amount to display.
        See Also:
        WauzCore.MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL, applyExperienceBonus(Player, double), ValueIndicator.spawnExpIndicator(Location, int), PlayerConfigurator.levelUpCharacter(Player), PlayerConfigurator.setCharacterExperience(Player, double)

      • applyExperienceBonus

        public static double applyExperienceBonus(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                          double experience)
        Applies experience bonuses, based on the passive stats of the player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that will earn the exp.
        experience - The exp without bonus.
        Returns:
        The exp with added bonus.
        See Also:
        EquipmentUtils.getExperienceBonus(ItemStack), PlayerConfigurator.getCharacterPetIntelligence(Player, int)

      • getExpToLevel

        public static int getExpToLevel(int level)
        Gets the amount of exp needed to reach the next player level. Based on a fibonacci-like sequence.
        Parameters:
        level - The next level to be reached.
        Returns:
        The needed exp to the level.
